explains: n. 小冲突，小规模战斗；小争论
vi. 进行小规模战斗；发生小争论

sentences.en: After about 20 minutes, the skirmish was over.
sentences.cn: 经过约20分钟对打，这场小冲突就酱结束了。

sentences.en: The next skirmish will come at NRG's annual meeting on July 21st.
sentences.cn: 下一次交锋将在7月21日的NRG年会上。

sentences.en: Guatemala was the first skirmish of the cold war in Latin America.
sentences.cn: 危地马拉是冷战在拉丁美洲的首个发生地。
